sentences.english: Associated with old age, he doted.
The ignorance of a judge is the misfortune of the innocent.
sentences.chinese: 法官的昏聵是無辜者的災難。

sentences.english: The judge is the speaking law.
sentences.chinese: 法官的昏聵是無辜者的災難。

definition: lit. helping tyrant Zhou 商紂王|商纣王[Shang1 Zhou4 wang2] in his oppression (idiom)/fig. to take the side of the evildoer/giving succor to the enemy
to damage the country and cause suffering to the people (idiom)
the shrike and the swallow fly in different directions (idiom)/(usually of a couple) to part from each other
full of youthful vigor (idiom)/in the prime of youth
toadying for personal gain/to curry favor/to study in great depth
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
hard to tell if it's real or sham
to whisper to one another's ear
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: not recognizing one's family (idiom); self-centered and not making any allowances for the needs of one's relatives
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
